detail.content: Course Syllabi                     PLEASE NOTE:  Sample syllabi are posted to provide you with additional information for the course registration process and may not reflect the final versions of the courses. Content, schedule, requirements, assignments, etc. may change. Please do not use these samples as a basis for buying textbooks, scheduling, preparing assignments, etc.     Please check the NYU Registrar's website for completed updated course information (i.e. day, time, faculty).
